Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous substance, flaking away in places, the exterior is covered with a red-brown self-slip and bears very faint traces of black-painted characters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393256) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393256)
